name: A Grave Adventure
description:
Try to find a way out of the grave yard as you collect coins delving down into graves, just to be pulled back up gain. 

How to Play:

Move left "a", "left arrow"
Move right "d", "right arrow"
jump "w", "up arrow"

repel down "s" or "down arrow"

attack(with pickaxe bought from store) "z", "m"

pause "P", "esc"

to exit the game press pause during gameplay and press the quit button.

your total number of coins is in the upper left hand corner, it is used to buy items in the shop.
Be careful not to get in debt!

Try to delve down into the grave,

Good luck and have fun!

*Note the web version does not work in all browsers
